text: Tropical Storm Lee was the 12th named storm of the 2011 Atlantic hurricane season. Lee was responsible for 21 deaths and property damage in total was in excess of $2 billion. The storm affected areas from Louisiana and Texas to Pennsylvania and New York. ==References== Category:Atlantic tropical storms Category:2011 in weather Category:2010s in Louisiana Category:2011 in Texas Category:2010s in Pennsylvania Category:2011 in New York (state) Category:Hurricanes in Louisiana
title: Tropical Storm Lee (2011)
